user_query: I need to send an important announcement to all employees in my company.

TaskList.description: Check the current status of the company's Maytapi WhatsApp phone.
Check for any blacklisted phone numbers in the SMSAPI.com account.
Suggest effective communication strategies for delivering the message to all employees.
Fetch the screenshot of the Maytapi WhatsApp session to ensure it is ready for communication.
Send the important announcement to all employees using the current Maytapi WhatsApp.
